duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage daily functions of handscoring contracts, including scheduling, resource planning, and team management.
Utilize science and math expertise in item development, scoring process, and client interactions.
Communicate effectively with various stakeholders and work in a team environment.
Mentor and train Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers in their roles and responsibilities.
Ensure clear communication through various channels and maintain a confidential work environment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree required; degree within Life Science or Physical Sciences is strongly preferred. Additional Math college courses are preferred.
